name: DEEP FRY
description:
Swim deep, little fry, and reach the deep fry before you’re deep-fried (by egregious filters)!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (with the theme “OUT OF CONTROL”), DEEP FRY is a game about a little fish with big dreams... he saw a French fry drop to the bottom of the ocean trench and will stop at nothing to reach it.

Use A and D to steer left and right to avoid eels and seek the fabled French fry.

Thanks for playing! 

 

THE TEAM:

Jeremy Sapsed – Development

Harvey West – Development

Rebecca Smith – Sound Effects

Daniel Thomas – Music

Benji Thomas – Art (backgrounds + splash)

Robert Ashby – Art (sprites)

 

ADDITIONAL RESOURCES USED:

Sound Effects - all sourced from the Platform Post (https://www.platformpp.tv/) sound database - with some changes made!
